Chicago Sheet Folders

Commercial folder maintenance and troubleshooting

📖 Manual 🛠 Parts 🚨 Troubleshooting

Maintenance Checklist

  • Inspect belts for fraying and tension weekly
  • Lube bearings every 200 operating hours
  • Inspect folding knives for sharpness and alignment
  • Check photo-eyes and interlocks for proper function

Common Issues

Skewed Folds
  • Check feed table squareness
  • Verify belt tension and tracking
  • Align guides
Wrinkling
  • Reduce bite pressure
  • Inspect knife edge
  • Adjust roller gap
